snippet: An agreement seeks to resolve a lawsuit accusing the city of failing to prepare to help shelter, transport and evacuate disabled residents for a tropical storm.
abstract: New York City agrees to make sweeping changes in accommodations for people with disabilities during disasters and other emergencies; agreement seeks to resolve a lawsuit accusing the city of failing to prepare to help shelter, transport and evacuate disabled residents for a tropical storm.
lead_paragraph: An agreement seeks to resolve a lawsuit accusing the city of failing to prepare to help shelter, transport and evacuate disabled residents for a tropical storm.

headline.main: New York City to Alter Preparations for Disabled in Disasters
headline.print_headline: City to Alter Preparations for Disabled in Disasters
